Tutorial: https://www.pythonguis.com/tutorials/packaging-pyqt5-applications-linux-pyinstaller/

Documentation: https://fpm.readthedocs.io/en/latest/cli-reference.html

Steps:

1. Install PyInstaller, ruby, fpm
2. Build using pyinstaller spec
3. Create local folders
4. Copy files to folders
5. Generate package using `fpm -C package -s dir -t deb -n "dummy-files-creator" -v $VERSION -p dummy-files-creator.deb`
6. Add Makefile/python script for all steps
